Generated Narrative: StructureDefinition EHDSMedicationDispenseObligations

NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
EHDSMedicationDispense 0..*EHDSMedicationDispense
Elements defined in Ancestors:header, dispensingOrganizationOrDevice[x], dispenseLocation, receiver[x], relatedRequest, medication, dispensedQuantity, timeOfDispensation, substitution, dosageInstructions, comment
Medication dispensation model
Instances of this logical model can be the target of a Reference
header
subject O1..1EHDSPatientPatient who the medication was prescribed to. [Used for searching]
ObligationsActor
SHALL:able-to-populateDispensing System
authorship
author O1..1EHDSHealthProfessionalThe person who dispensed the product, and takes the responsibility of the dispensation or declining the dispense. [Used for searching]
ObligationsActor
SHALL:able-to-populateDispensing System
datetime O1..1dateTimeThe time of recording the dispense or declining the request. [Used for searching]
ObligationsActor
SHALL:able-to-populateDispensing System
status O1..1CodeableConceptStatus of the dispense. In case of declining a dispense, the status should be 'declined'. [Used for searching]
ObligationsActor
SHALL:able-to-populateDispensing System
statusReason[x] O0..1CodeableConcept, stringReason for the current status of dispensation, for example the reason why the dispensation was made invalid
ObligationsActor
SHOULD:able-to-populateDispensing System
identifier O1..*IdentifierBusiness identifier(s) for the dispense. [Used for searching]
ObligationsActor
SHOULD:able-to-populateDispensing System
dispenseLocation O0..1EHDSLocationLocation of dispense
ObligationsActor
SHOULD:able-to-populateDispensing System
receiver[x] O0..1EHDSPatient, EHDSHealthProfessional, EHDSRelatedPersonIdentification of the person who received the dispensed medication, especially when it was not the patient
ObligationsActor
SHOULD:able-to-populateDispensing System
relatedRequest O0..*IdentifierIdentifier of the prescription or prescription item the dispense is related to
ObligationsActor
SHOULD:able-to-populateDispensing System
medication O1..1EHDSMedicationExact dispensed product
ObligationsActor
SHALL:able-to-populateDispensing System
dispensedQuantity O1..1QuantityNumber of dispensed packages if the pack size is known, or number of smaller items/units
ObligationsActor
SHALL:able-to-populateDispensing System
timeOfDispensation O1..1dateTimeDate and time of dispensation
ObligationsActor
SHALL:able-to-populateDispensing System
substitution O0..1BaseIndicated whether substitution was made by the dispenser
ObligationsActor
SHALL:able-to-populateDispensing System
substitutionOccurred O1..1booleanIndicated whether substitution was made by the dispenser
ObligationsActor
SHALL:able-to-populateDispensing System
type O0..1CodeableConceptWhat kind of substitution was made by the dispenser
ObligationsActor
SHALL:able-to-populateDispensing System
reason O0..*CodeableConceptReason why the substitution was made
ObligationsActor
SHALL:able-to-populateDispensing System
dosageInstructions O0..*EHDSDosagingDosaging and administration instructions
ObligationsActor
SHOULD:able-to-populateDispensing System
comment O0..*stringAdditional information or comments
ObligationsActor
SHOULD:able-to-populateDispensing System

name: EHDSMedicationDispenseObligations
title: Medication dispense model obligations
description: Obligations for the logical model for medication dispense.

element.short: Medication dispensation model
element.definition: Logical model for medication dispensation (based on request or independently)

element.short: Header level metadata about the dispense
element.definition: Header level metadata about the dispense
